Consumer_Reviews.review_title: Of course there's no glitter in this primer. You put the primer on before you put the glitter on your eyes and it holds it in pl
Consumer_Reviews.review_text: To the girl that said there was no glitter in this: It is a primer you put on Before you put the glitter on and it holds it in place so it doesn't end up everywhere 😀
Great!

Consumer_Reviews.review_title: There is no glitter in this product as the website ...
Consumer_Reviews.review_text: There is no glitter in this product as the website described.  So I was dissapointed to see that this was missing glitter in this primer.

sub category rank: 4 in Beauty & Personal Care > Makeup > Eyes > Eyeshadow Bases & Primers

Product_Name: e.l.f. Essential Glitter Primer - Clear elf Eye Eyelid Bond Crease

Category: Beauty & Personal Care › Makeup › Eyes › Eyeshadow Bases & Primers
Description: Do you know what's annoying, when you create a totally fabulous makeup look that fades within a few hours (or less). Avoid the frustration by using the SHANY eyes and lips primer. This little jar of wonders will make your beloved eye shadows and lip products appear true-to-color and will not crease. More importantly, it lasts all day. You wont have to worry about it fading or melting. Its waterproof formulation is perfect for students, professionals, and performers. The primer blends in perfectly with every skin tone and skin type. This specially formulated primer is Paraben and Talc free has to be part of your beauty routine before applying color to your eyes or lips. The long lasting formula will enhance and show the true color of your favorite lipstick, lip-gloss and eye shadows while preventing any creasing. Your lips will look fuller and smoother all day when you use our primer with any lipstick. It will blend beautifully with the eye shadow of your choice while making it last longer, and prevent your makeup from melting or smudging. Made in USA.

Consumer_Reviews.review_title: I love it, I am new to make up so ...
Consumer_Reviews.review_text: I love it, I am new to make up so I was going on a whim on what to buy. This stuff is perfect! I have always had issues with my make up staying on all day, with this primer it does just that. I posted some photos (sorry for the ugliness of my face but I wanted to show how it looked before putting the make up on top.) It is pretty small but a little goes a long way with this primer, you really don't need a lot. It is so easy to apply and it spreads out soo perfect. It doesn't bunch up or get clumpy, it isn't sticky and has no smell. Doesn't irritate my eyes at all, and as you can see I even use it on my lips under Matte lipgloss and it keeps my lips from feeling dry. It is a must buy, and with the price you are getting some amazing stuff.

Consumer_Reviews.review_title: Not one negative and that is RARE. Highly Recommended!
Consumer_Reviews.review_text: OMG!  I found my new favorite beauty product! I ordered this not knowing exactly what to expect. I'm always hesitant about trying a new brand. But  the price was right and the stats looked good so I jumped.As luck my have it, I got this in the mail right before I started getting ready for the day.First thing I want to say is that it has a nice pleasant smell.  Not perfum-y but it doesn't have that chemical smell that some bases have.It's very smooth and easy to apply.  A little goes a long way!! I can see where this container will last awhile!I used it first as a base for my eyes.  I have a tendency to use darker shades that may smudge.  and my eyeliner sometimes streaks also.  I can honestly say, my makeup stayed put!  I am very impressed!The true test,  LIPSTICK.  I use lipliner and gloss.  My lip liner NEVER stays on.  like ever.  And it usually feathers out.  The majority of the day it stayed put,  After a few hour it did start to wear off.  But I can't complain about that at all.My final praise is that it doesn't have any harsh chemicals.  I have very sensitive skin and and very critical about make-up.  I have literally ZERO complaints.  And that is rare.HIGHLY RECOMMEND! and will be a repeat buyer!

Consumer_Reviews.review_title: Left without primer / right with primer
Consumer_Reviews.review_text: Awesome! I found the answer to everything. You'll see an instant difference

I used this primer today before I had an award ceremony and I absolutely love it! It made my eyeshadow so much more vibrant and made my eyes really pop! It is in such a cute little container and is very easy to apply. A little bit goes a long way! I applied this at around 7 A.M. and It is now 6 P.M. and my eyeshadow still looks amazing. It does not crease which is a major plus and is very light. I have yet to try it on my lips but I will be trying soon since I am so impressed with what it did on my eyes. This is definitely my favorite primer by far.

Consumer_Reviews.review_title: Still on the fence - see recent edits
Consumer_Reviews.review_text: Not sure how I feel about this product.  I had been using a stick primer which is pretty easy to use.  This product seems a bit greasy.  I'm still playing around with it.  I use a little scoop to get it out of the jar to put on my finger then to apply on my lids.  I DO like that it is paraben and talc free.  That was my motivation to purchase it in the first place.  I'm still on the fence.7/12/17 - ok, I've given it a bit more time.  I now use a special make-up qtip to scoop out a small amount from the jar.  Spread it on my eyelids, a pretty thin layer.  I think I was using too much before.  Now I'm thinking I like this product.  Just had to get used to it and play around with the amount.7/29/17 now 4 stars.  I like this primer.

Consumer_Reviews.review_title: Shany is my New Best Friend...and My Man Loves It!
Consumer_Reviews.review_text: The product is perfect for my skin tone. I wore this last night for the first time and my man loved it! So I will definitely be ordering this product again. Thanks Shany.

Consumer_Reviews.review_title: No need to spend big bucks on eye shadow base!
Consumer_Reviews.review_text: Shany eye shadow base is talc free and paraben free. It's creamy in the container, but dries on your eyelids to form a good base for eye shadow. It does not give the eyelids a dry feel at all. It evens out the skin tone. It's a light flesh tone, but since it's an eye shadow base, women with darker skin would apply their desired eye shadow colors over it anyway, so I think it could be used by anyone. I just tried it today with some eye shadows I bought recently. Compared to when I wore the shadows without the base, the shadows stayed on all day. It's possible to spend $20 or even more for eye shadow base from fancy companies. Many of these products come in tubes, so you might squeeze out more than you need, thus wasting expensive product. With this little pot of Shany eye shadow base that can't happen. It's supposed to be a lipstick base too, but I haven't tried it for that purpose.  A little goes a very long way, so I think it will last a long time. I recommend this product and would buy it again.

This is my second purchase of this product. I am just finishing up my first jar purchased almost a year ago. It is a very SMALL jar, packed in a BIG box, so look carefully through the packing. My first thought was that it wouldn't last very long because of the size, but boy was I wrong. I use it every day. Very little product is required. I not only use it around my lips to prevent creasing of lipstick, and on my eyelids so that shadow will adhere (even cheap shadow) but also as a blemish concealer. I just dot blemishes very lightly before using my foundation, again, VERY little needed.One negative reviewer mentioned that it is too light. It is a light flesh color, but it doesn't matter a whole lot if it is lighter than your complexion as your foundation or eyeshadow is going over it. It does a great job, is affordable, and I can't imagine doing without it anymore.

Consumer_Reviews.review_title: Small jar but the product works !!
Consumer_Reviews.review_text: I am new to primer. After my first attempt, I thought to myself "waste of money". The next time around, well I am quite pleased with the product and have totally dismissed the fact that the jar is so SMALL.  I do not use eye shadow, this was basically  bought to experiment in regard to my eyeliner collection. On my lids I have gotten pretty results good using an old Besame cake mascara brush. On one end is a very delicate fine brush with gentle hairs. and I can draw  a perfect line, smooth and not caked. A LITTLE of this stuff goes a long way. I must say my eyeliner is perfect for many hours. Still looked freshly applied  and not a hint of "shadows" forming as the sun went down. Please note if you have very dry lids, this could cake on you. I applied the primer after my eye gel and C cream. Same for the lips. The best lip results were obtained when my lips were moisturized FIRST. I use the same little Besame brush for my lips too.(outline and pinky finger to apply on lip)  My lipstick appeared somewhat lighter in  color, but the stay power was increased so I am happy. I gave a 4 star rating because I felt the manufacturer could provide a somewhat larger jar. This jar is easy to lose.

Consumer_Reviews.review_title: Surprised me...who knew it would work so well!
Consumer_Reviews.review_text: I do love this!  It stays on me and I work my a$s off, I came home after a 9 hour intense as hell day, and I looked fresh and put together.  But this is a teeny tiny pot of primer.  a little does go a long way.  I'm impressed, and that normally takes a lot.P.S. Prime sent it with my 40lb bag of dog food, floating free in the box.  This thing is so tiny We almost missed it in the package.  Not cool Amazon!

Consumer_Reviews.review_title: Exactly what I was looking for
Consumer_Reviews.review_text: I love eye makeup but have very oily skin and especially in the summer my eye shadow fades, creases and even gets in my eyes towards the end of the day. My regular face primer was too matte for eye area use - looked flaky and wrinkly with powder shadows - but this works exactly as needed. The jar is tiny but a little goes a long way. I dab a touch on my finger tip and gently rub it into the whole eye lid - up to the brow bone. My eyeshadow lasts all day and it brightens the eye area to boosts the color of bright and translucent shadows. I've used it every day for a month and barely made a dent in the jar.

Consumer_Reviews.review_title: very good and suitable for both eyes and lips!!
Consumer_Reviews.review_text: I think this is a pretty good primer.  I hear complaints about the jar being small. How much product does one expect for the price?  You only need a tiny amount on your eyes and slightly more on your lips but that also depends on the size of ur lips and mine are full. Having said all this...I will purchase again.

It's a pretty, neutral color that won't compete with any shadow you apply over it (I use it as an eyelid base), but I don't necessarily think it preserves my makeup look. I still got creases on my eyelids, and it didn't necessarily make my shadow pop as some reviewers said it does. I am a light/medium Latina, and I only really wear purple or neutral/brown eye color, so my expectations weren't necessarily high. For the size, I suppose the price is ok. I do like that it's paraben free and not tested on animals, but I think Urban Decay's primer potion is a better option for me.

Consumer_Reviews.review_title: Awful! What's with all the 4 and 5 stars??
Consumer_Reviews.review_text: This seemed like a great idea to have since I love to use lipstick but when I applied this primer to my lips it dried and chapped them so much! I only tried using it twice (had a tingly effect) and had such a bad reaction to it--my lips had red splotches!I think I might be allergic to whatever is in it???I'm still trying everything to get my lips back into healthy shape! I'm so uncomfortable after having used this product I feel like I've never had dry, chapped, sore lips like this before!! I gonna see if I can get a refund and return this because this did not work for me!

I am so sad to report that after giving this a try for a week, about halfway through the day (every single day of the week) at an office job, in room temperature, in Seattle, and in the middle of winter that this eyeshadow primer did not hold up! Creases by noon :( I'm so disappointed, as I had high hopes for it. Oh well...what do you expect for $7 :( Going back to Urban Decay. It's worth the extra $20.

The product did not go on smooth, no matter what application I tried. And even worse, after adding eyeshadow, it made me look older, wrinkling my skin. It made my lips look older as well! I'm still on the hunt for an eyeshadow primer that has organic ingredients and actually work.

It seems that as soon as I find a good eye shadow primer it is discontinued. I bought this one because I could no longer find my previous go-to and I am very happy with it. I apply it in a thin layer with a highlighter brush. It helps with shadow vibrancy and keeps everything stay put all day long. I do wish it was a tad lighter or had shades to offer so I could use it as my lid color. Hopefully this will be around for a long time.

This is my first primer for both the lips and the eyes. A little goes a long way so the small size of the bottle is reasonable and its very smooth and easy to apply. It spreads on as a pale pinkish color that is a little shiny. I apply it in the morning before going to class or to work and my lip color stays very well throughout the day.It isn't moisturizing so I'd suggest applying chapstick after applying the base + lip color that way it doesn't interfere with the primer's ability to stick to the lips. I've applied it both before and after and it lasts longer for me if I apply it after.I don't wear a lot of eyeshadow but I've worn it a couple times when I was going out and it works well as a base for my eye shadow. After a night of dancing my color still looked good too.  think I prefer it as an eyeshadow primer on my lids.and then I let the color fade out, but you could get a pretty dramatic effect with more of it.

This stuff is amazing. I've been wanting to get a mac paint pot but wasn't wanting to shell out the $$. Thought I'd give this a try. It's brilliant! Has completely changed my eye  game. Any shadows I've used it under have stayed in place all day long. I have fairly dry skin and do moisturize my lids before applying. I then add a powder over it to set before applying any shadow. It is a small jar but fair for the price. I will definitely buy again.

Consumer_Reviews.review_title: Works great on oily lids, but not fingernail friendly
Consumer_Reviews.review_text: I have long fingernails so that makes it difficult to apply with fingertips the way I have with other eye shadow primers that come in tube form, especially since the compact this product comes in is very tiny.  However, good things do come in small packages!  Using a small lipstick application brush, a little tiny bit of this stuff goes a long way.  You'll want to apply a very thin layer and let it try a few minutes to set while you do your foundation, blush, etc.  If you don't put in on too thick and give it a few minutes to set, you are guaranteed to have bright shadow that lasts all day without creasing.  I have VERY oily skin and eyelids and this really works... much better than L'Oreal's Magic Decrease primer, which is the last one I tried (hated it) and just as well as some more expensive ones I've tried in the past.  I'd have given this 5 stars if I didn't have to use a small brush to apply it, but despite the slightly less convenient application process, I would buy this again because it does work well.

I really wanted to like this after seeing all the great reviews. I have oily eyelids and it's very hard to find something that works. I read a lot of the reviews to pay careful attention to see if it was right for me. It lasted for about 2 hours, and then it was like having nothing on. That is really my biggest complaint. Second thing I didn't like was that the tub is SO SMALL! Not only can I not get enough out with a finger (okay, so I can use a brush), but even then I don't find that sanitary. I guess I should have thought of that prior to ordering, but I want to put it out there now so that someone else might think of it. Last, it came in a box just short of shoebox size. The diameter of the container is the size of a quarter, and it's about half an inch deep. What a waste of packaging. I know there are things like this that ship in padded envelopes, so I was really surprised to see that. I won't return it because it's too much of a hassle, but now I'm on the search for another product :(.

I really like this product! I was looking for an inexpensive eyelid primer to help my loose mineral eye shadows stick better. I have not used it on the lips. It does exactly what I want it to. My eye shadow is more vibrant, and it stays all day without creasing (I have hooded & oily eyelids). It looks like you get such a tiny amount but it really goes a long way. I've used this daily for over 3 months and I have a ton left. Highly recommend.

Bought this based on reviews. I use as an eye base. It creases on me. My eye lids are oily, so maybe that is why. It does help my eye makeup look more fresh at the end of the day. This product with last a long time even though the container is sample size. I am going to try to use a different eye cream on eye lids or none at all to see if this resolves my issue.

I absolutely love this eye primer, it's my go-to every morning and it lasts from 6:30 am when i apply till about 9pm when I wipe my make up off and get ready for bed. It holds the shimmers and the mattes and it even does great keeping my upper eyelid eyeliner in place and doesnt negatively affect my eyelash glue and lashes. Will definitely be purchasing again!

Consumer_Reviews.review_title: GET IT GET IT GET IT
Consumer_Reviews.review_text: Before purchasing this product I had only used eye primer by elf and obviously being such a cheap brand, elf didn't do it for me.  After searching for a cheap but high quality product I decided to buy this eye and lip primer and I do not regret it!  It comes in a little pot that is easy to get product out of.The actual primer goes on like a creamy gel and feels kind of sticky even after a long drying time which doesn't bother me but I would imagine might  bother other people.  I have had this for almost a year and I've only used a slight amount.  I think/hope this will last for a very long time because I love love love it.I actually wore the same lipstick as one of my friends. I was wearing primer, she wasn't. I applied my lipstick 5 hours earlier than she applied hers and hers wore off a few hours before mine. Honestly this primer has solved so many of my eyeshadow/lipstick problems. I am in love with it and definitely recommend it!!

I'm in LOVE! I used it last night for the first time and it was amazing. I have light brown skin, and I like to use pinks and browns for my eye shadow, so sometimes it's hard to get the color to show up. This really made the colors pop with much less product and it was flawless all night. No creasing or anything. I even accidentally fell asleep without taking my makeup off and it was still perfect in the morning. I used to use Too Faced Shadow Insurance, which runs close to $30 a tube. This worked infinitely better at a much better price point. One thing to note is that it is slightly darker in person, so some people may not like that. However, it was perfect for me, since I have a slightly darker complexion.**UPDATE Feb 27, 2017**Unfortunately, I have to take away a star. I don't typically wear makeup during the week, mostly just weekends, but I found that if I wore this a couple weekends in a row, I always got a little dry/rough patch over one of my eyes. I don't have particularly sensitive skin I would say, but maybe I'm allergic to something in the primer. Besides this fact, it still works great. If you can use it without this side-effect, I would definitely say go for it. But for me, I'll need to continue searching for my holy grail product.

Bought this first a while ago and thought it was good and liked it fine. Bought the MAC Painterly paint pot yesterday and was surprised to find that the results weren't nearly as good as the Shany primer. While the amount of brighter pigmentation is about the same, I actually had a harder time blending my eyeshadow with MAC Painterly than wth Shany. I actually plan on returning the MAC product and sticking with this instead!

Consumer_Reviews.review_title: This is a nice primer. I had been using another product for ...
Consumer_Reviews.review_text: This is a nice primer.  I had been using another product for a few years, and it was causing my eyelids to rash/scale. So far no problems with this product.  Goes on smooth and only takes a little.  Only complaint is the tub is so small, that it's hard to get out with just your fingertip.... I have to use a Q-tip to dip and apply.

Consumer_Reviews.review_title: I really like Shanny! It keeps my eye make up
Consumer_Reviews.review_text: I really like Shanny! It keeps my eye make up,  to stay on so well.Alo good for my lips, keeps lipstick looking good for hours. Thanks for a good product.

As suggested by other reviews, this is a small container but it will last a very long time. You only need a teensy tiny bit and it give a nice base for your eye shadow to stay put all day and way into the night without touch up!  I love this product and will keep using it forever!

I'm trying to save money, so I bought these eye primer instead of Urban Decay's primer potion (which I love, but can be a little pricey). When I first applied this, I thought it was crap because it made my eyeshadow crease like no other. I applied it with my finger, like I do with any eye primer I would use or have used in the past. I tried using more in case I wasn't using enough, and then I tried using less in case I was using too much to cause creasing.After a little tampering, I decided to apply it with a brush instead of my finger and it works soooo much better. I have no idea why a brush worked better to apply and have my makeup stay on, but I'm glad I used it. I washed my hands before applying it with my fingers, but I guess the brush is better for this product. Ever since, my makeup has not creased at all and can last all day (and even until the next day hahaha). I'd highly recommend this primer as a cheaper yet very effective alternative to a more expensive eye primer, as it works the same.

This goes on smoothly and helps my eye shadow to last all day without creasing.  I usually apply my primer with a concealer brush but have found with this product is goes on better if I do use my concealer brush to place the product on my lid but then use my fingertip to apply it.  Will definitely purchase this again rather than continuing to use the more pricey department store brands I have been using.

Consumer_Reviews.review_title: Works as it should. Just take note, if ...
Consumer_Reviews.review_text: Works as it should. Just take note, if you have a darker skin tone, it's color once applied will be VERY light in comparison to your skin. Only downside I noticed related to that is it turned my very red lipstick into a very bright pink. On the other hand, my eye shadow was rocking my socks!  Didn't seem to have an issue there.

Bought it for a wedding I worked, and ended up using it on myself nearly every day. I have oily lids and this helps my shadow stay in place. It's not chalky or cakey at all. I've never used it on my lips, so I cannot speak to that. I always use a brush with this 1.for sanitation reasons and 2.because the pot is quite small. There's a lot of product though. A little bit goes a very long way.

Consumer_Reviews.review_title: Definitely recommend for those with oily eye lids/skin!
Consumer_Reviews.review_text: Wonderful product! I have very oily skin and all eye shadows: no matter the price or company would clump in my eyelid after only a couple of hours of wear. This primer really makes a difference, I can get at least 6 hours out of this primer and as long as I dab my eyelids with rice paper mid-day I can get a couple more hours of wear. I give 4 stars because for the price you don't get a lot of product, which is a shame.

Do not helps to keep makeup for long! So sad, I read so many reviews and I thought this was going to be a good choice. BUT NOT!I did a fantacy eye makeup and took me so long to finish it because this shany eye prime did not work as others and almost need to start the make up all over again, need to add other eye primer over the old makeup and finish the work. I insted used eye primer from Art Deco  5 stars*!

Up to this point, if I use any primer, it's MAC. However, the cost for MAC is ridiculous and I get frustrated spending that much. SO, I stumbled upon this product and it's great!I have VERY pale skin, like the lightest shade in every brand of foundation, so most concealers/tinted primers don't work for me because they're too brown or too yellow. This one is perfect. The color is very light with a barely pink undertone, so it works great as a base for shadows, and it really keeps them in place all day. I actually have been using this as a concealer/face primer because it's so perfect for my skin tone.Only downside is that the container is really small (like barely bigger around than a quarter, and only about an inch deep). However, a little goes a long way and the product is so great that it really is worth it to me.

Consumer_Reviews.review_title: Great! Very tiny, but worth a try! Good seller!
Consumer_Reviews.review_text: Haven't tried this yet. Came exactly as described and fast, well packaged delivery. Item is alot smaller than I expected. I'm sure a little goes along way, but it's only accessible w/your pinky and make sure to have no nail on it, cause it's that tiny. That was it's only set back for me. The reviews were pretty good, so it's worth a try. The seller is good as well and unlike many other makeup products I ordered from different sellers, this came in tact, not ruined or melted, unlike most the other completely melted, broken, make up, espec lipsticks I ordered from other sellers. So I highly recommend this seller and their products! Hope it works well, cause I'll be back for more! Thanks! :)

Consumer_Reviews.review_title: Not the best if you have oily skin or plan to sweat
Consumer_Reviews.review_text: It's ok. I apply my makeup early on in the morning and when I do my eyeshadow, its typically a light smoky eye or a special kind of shadow shade. This primer only holds it up until about noon before its a blended mess.It doesn't crease too bad but still a little disappointed. The color is a a very light pink so it duos as a good natural brow bone highlighter if you get detailed with your makeup. I do have oily skin, so finding a product that will REALLY hold up is tricky. It also depends I think on your eye shape. I have hollow eyelids and a chubby brow bone. I had read more satisfied reviews and seemed convince this would work. The price is not bad, I have spent more on worst products. But as far as eye and lip primers go...my search will continue.

Worst lip primer ever! It applies as white and dry that you can't spread it evenly on your lips. They alter the color of your lipstick. Because of the white substance, it turns your lipstick lighter. Worst of all, they don't accept returns. What am I supposed to do with a bad product, give it away which I wouldn't even dare.

I'm pretty sure this is basically a small jar of concealer but I still really enjoy it. It's great for traveling and I think it helps create a neutral base for my lip color. I haven't tried on eyelids but plan to. I only recommended it if you want a small jar for easy travel like I do. It's about the size of a generic water bottle cap.

I absolutely love this! I never thought it was important to wear an eyeshadow base, figured my foundation was enough. My eyeshadow was brighter but the best thing was my eyeliner stayed put all day! At times my eyes can water a lot. This is water proof and made my eyeliner stay put throughout the day even when my eyes watered. Even used under my eyes and helped hide my dark dark circles. This will be a staple in my makeup collection!!

While this is slightly lighter than the product shown in the photo, Shany eye and lip primer works very well. I apply it before eye shadow in the morning, and it makes my colors last all day. The consistency is very smooth and creamy, and is a very pale pink, which makes colors really pop. (Also doubles as an emergency under eye concealer lol). Really a very good, low cost primer. (Though if you are going for lots of product, this may not be for you, as the package is very small). Should last a good long while though, if you only apply eye shadow on the weekends like I do.

Am pleased to find a suitable replacement for the Avon Eyeshadow Primer I have used for years.  It does wear well w/o changing color even when exposed to very sunny conditions.  Will be back for more.

Consumer_Reviews.review_title: Decent less expensive option for a primer.
Consumer_Reviews.review_text: Seemed to work well. A little disappointed with packaging. The stickers looked kind of..old..faded and had fresher stickers on top of the older looking one so I was a bit put off by that..but the material seemed fresh and works well enough.  Dabbed on my lips with my finger, kept the lipstick on for a few hours when it normally rubs off in half an hour. Color dulled a bit but stayed in tact. I was using a Victoria secret lipstick. For now it seems to be a good option for the price. Will have to use it a bit more to see how well it works with other brands and items.

This is a really great eyelid primer. I haven't used it on my lips though I know that I can. For my eyes, this stuff lasts all day as a primer and works well with my eye shadow. It's very small, smaller than I expected. And even though it's light I didn't realize that when I put on eye shadow over it, it would dull the effect of the eye shadow. So now I just use darker shadow and it shows up lighter than normal over this primer. I also use MAC primer so I thought it would be similar but the little jar is about half the size. I have sensitive eyes and at the end of the day I don't have that gritty feeling on my eyes when I use this. For the price and how well this works, I'll be buying it again.

Consumer_Reviews.review_title: Works very well on my eyelids
Consumer_Reviews.review_text: I like this so much more than other eye primers that I have used!  I have oily skin and a lot of eye primers are too creamy to work well with my oily eyelids.  This product, however, goes on very matte and seems to make my eye shadow SO MUCH more vibrant.  It also stays put a lot better.I do not see any effect when I use this as a lip primer. It doesn't seem to help much at all.Also, I don't love the container. It's so small that it's going to get hard to get out as it gets less full. I use a small, stiff brush to get it out, which should help me get everything from the container as it empties, but it would be nicer if it was more flat and wide, so I could just use a finger.

Consumer_Reviews.review_title: ... lipstick and eye shadow on all day and I love it!
Consumer_Reviews.review_text: It keeps my lipstick and eye shadow on all day and I love it!

Consumer_Reviews.review_title: MAC PREP + PRIME LIP does a much better job.
Consumer_Reviews.review_text: It does not work well as a lip primer. It left a layer of white stuff on my lips and changed the color of the lipsticks. And, it does not moisturize my lips at all. MAC  PREP + PRIME LIP does a much better job.

Consumer_Reviews.review_title: this is a good size. It holds your eyeshadow in place without ...
Consumer_Reviews.review_text: Can't beat the price. The size is kinda small but for someone who doesn't wear eyeshadow everyday, this is a good size.It holds your eyeshadow in place without creasing for a few hours easily. Yet to test it out for an entire day-wear to see if it endureshumidity. But so far, I'm happy with the product, especially the price. Big brand primers are ridiculously expensive.
Great eye and lip primer. It has just enough color I don't even wear eye shadow with it. A little goes a long way. Another item that will always be a staple in my makeup.

The color is natural and flattering. I use it on my lid and nothing else. It has a soft rosey pink color to it. If your skin is darker than mine the pink will show more. The container was smaller than I imagined, but I think it will still last a long time. I have photos with just the product on my lid, and hen the final look with eye liner and shadow on the crease of my eye.
Dries out my lips

Consumer_Reviews.review_title: I have very sensitive skin especially around my eyes. ...
Consumer_Reviews.review_text: I have very sensitive skin especially around my eyes.  I have not had any problems with irritation or skin drying.  Primer helps my eye shadow last longer during the day.

Consumer_Reviews.review_title: I recommend putting on chapstick and wear it for about an ...
Consumer_Reviews.review_text: I recommend putting on chapstick and wear it for about an hour before applying this product on the lips.  It started making my lips dry.  But does a decent job for the eye shadow staying on.  Does better for the lipstick staying on though.

Consumer_Reviews.review_title: This one looked fairly similar and had good reviews so I thought I'd give it a shot
Consumer_Reviews.review_text: I ordered this because Avon discontinued their primer I had been using for years. This one looked fairly similar and had good reviews so I thought I'd give it a shot. I apply with a brush, and while it does go on smooth and easily, it feels very stiff when it dries. I wasted two eyeliner pencils because of this primer. It is so thick and stiff that the eyeliner doesn't want to move across your lid and just breaks. Not the worst primer I've used, but certainly not the best either.
This stuff is amazing!! It really does work well for the lips. It has reduced feathering by at least 90%. If you put two coats of this on lightly it should be 100%.

Consumer_Reviews.review_title: This product is amazing. Big things come in little packages
Consumer_Reviews.review_text: Wow. You guys. This product is amazing. Big things come in little packages!
This stuff is awesome.  It keeps my eyeshadow from creasing and keeps my lipstick vibrant through out the day.  I will purchase again.

Best makeup product ever! My face literally eats up make up, and this stuff makes my eyeshadow and lipstick stay in place and the colors go on true and vibrant. Extra bonus is that it works just like Benefit Porefessional on to hide larger pores around the nose and cheeks before foundation. I'd give it 10 stars if I could!

Consumer_Reviews.review_title: Will be a new beauty staple!
Consumer_Reviews.review_text: Very nice product. Not too cakey for 40+ eyes and oily lids. Sets product fine for everyday- but may not be as effective as Bare Esentuals Prime Time for high temps, dancing, etc. Small size but a little goes a long way, and really convenient to have lip and eye primer in one!

This works great!  A little goes a very long way!  I apply a little with a lip brush and then rub in with my finger.  It has helped my lipstick not to bleed through the lip liner and also my "color stay" lipstick to not "stain" my lips.I've used it for eyeshadow primer also.  It definitely helps the colors appear more vibrant and true.Worth the money.  This little "pot" will last me a couple years!  Lol!
Goes on nice and holds my eyeshadow on. Still does not hold eyeliner in place under the eye and I will still get it running under my eyes having to go and wipe off any stray eyeliner.
As far as eye primers go... this is not the best quality. The product creates creases after a few hours of wear. So disappointed.

Consumer_Reviews.review_title: pretty good product for the price
Consumer_Reviews.review_text: Wife's review: pretty good product for the price. Not the best eye primer (which is what I use it for) but you can't beat it for the price.

As you can see it is small i even put it next to my portable phone charger and its super small so im hoping that its one of thoes you dont need to use but a very little for it to go a long way buys i shall be back for and update
I Wouldn't use it for a lip primer. Made my lips dry and changed the color of my lipstick to a white finish. Looked terrible.

I really like it. It's worth what it cost.The benefit of course is the price, how easy it spreads and the color. Even thought it's lighter than I expect it isn't a bad color to use as a base. It works really well for applying colors you want to stand out. I have a very tan olive skin, and it's a very light champagne color on me.The con: It sometimes creases. I notice that once a while, it creases very noticeable. I don't know if it's the heat or perhaps I put too much on. But even with that being said, it makes a great addition to a beginners pack.

Consumer_Reviews.review_title: Nice neutral color that covers the eyelids well
Consumer_Reviews.review_text: Nice neutral color that covers the eyelids well.  You need VERY little of the product for each daily application and despite there being a small amount of the product in the jar, I think it should last for months.  Keeps my eye shadow on, without creases, all day.  A little hard to get out of the jar though, I have to use my fingernail.  (The circumference of the jar is small.)  Don't find this issue much of a problem though.  Very happy with my purchase.

Consumer_Reviews.review_title: A little darker than anticipated, not very easy to blend out.
Consumer_Reviews.review_text: This product definitely enhances the color of the shadow you put on it, but it's much darker than I expected. It's more of a medium light while I expected it to be pale. It works well, though. It could be easier to spread out but it's nice.

Consumer_Reviews.review_title: Just as good as other more expensive brands
Consumer_Reviews.review_text: Just as good as other more expensive brands. Stays on all day with no smudging. I will continue to use it.

Consumer_Reviews.review_title: I've even fallen asleep and the next morning my eyeshadow was still perfect!
Consumer_Reviews.review_text: I usually end up with one greasy line of eye makeup in the crease by lunchtime but THIS fixed all that!  I've even fallen asleep and the next morning my eyeshadow was still perfect!

It goes on and feels great, but it is very creamy which fights with my oily eyelids. The primer prevented creasing for a few hours, only a little longer than what my eyeshadow lasts normally without primer. I'll be sticking to the usual brand I use instead which lasts over 24 hours without fail (if I fall asleep and forget to take it off). I haven't tried this as a lip primer.

Consumer_Reviews.review_title: Very good. It was my first time trying primer
Consumer_Reviews.review_text: Very good. It was my first time trying primer, though I've always needed it. My eyes are extremely prone to causing my eyeliner to run, and I've constantly been on guard for raccoon-eye. I heard a while back that I should try primer, but didn't want to enslave myself to another necessary makeup product. But boy is this awesome. I think the container should last a good long time seeing as the lower lids is pretty much the only place I use it. Very worth it. Wish I would've tried it a long time ago!

I wanted to like this eye primer. However after 1 hour my eye makeup was smudged and creased where my eye lids go in. I was not very happy considering the size and price of this product. It was useless for my eyes.
I didn't expect it to be so cakey. Just an unusual texture. And when you put it on it is hard to get off

Consumer_Reviews.review_title: For lips - allows lipstick fade to natural evenly -  and for eyes, preserves your artwork all day (and maybe all night)
Consumer_Reviews.review_text: First lips:  I don't expect lipstick not to fade during the day, but HOW it fades is important to me.  With dry spots on my lips, color would adhere unevenly and bring out the dry look. UHG-ly. Balms have never solved that problem for me, nor have primers meant only for lips.  So now I start with a moisturizing balm and then apply the Shany and rub in thoroughly.  I apply my lipstick or stain and then lip liner. During the day or after eating or drinking, it simply fades to a natural lip color.  I never go through all that again during the day, I just refresh with a tinted gloss.  Now Eyes: My morning makeup routine is about 5 minutes longer than it needs to be because of a flaw in my permanent liner. Now I just apply this primer, which covers the flaw,, then a neutral shadow and then l line with my Stila liquid liner pen. So fast and easy. Not only does it look great upon application, but I learned this morning that it lasts all day and all night. I know, we should always take eye makeup off at night, but I'd rather sleep an extra 10 minutes sometimes. This is the second Shany product I have purchased and I've been impressed with both.

I bought this product to use for my eyes.  It does help my eye shadow stay on my eyes, but it put a filmy layer on my contacts.  I wash my hands after applying makeup, but somehow it would get in my eyes.  I didn't want to think it was this product that was putting a filmy substance on my contacts, but the day I stopped using it I did not have that problem. So unfortunately I will only be using the product if I am wearing glasses.

This product was much lighter than what I expected it to be, but after I apply a lipstick or eyeshadow it, you can't even tell it's there. This primer prevented my eyeshadow from creasing and wearing off in the middle of the day, it stayed on all day and it looked exactly like how I first applied it in the morning. I was pleasantly surprised at how well this worked as a lip base, my lipstick lasted for hours on end even after eating. I only had to reapply once vs. reapplying 5-6 times throughout the day.

Consumer_Reviews.review_title: This works well as an eye shadow base, but even better for lip color!
Consumer_Reviews.review_text: This works well as an eye shadow base, but even better for lip color! It's pretty much invisible when applied to my eyelids (thought it would probably show on a darker complexion), and can't be seen once color is applied over it. I also use it on my eyebrows prior to applying any eye pencil. It shows as a light/slightly sheer concealer color applied on the lips, but helps my lipcolor last all day. It is slightly drying, but the color payoff for other products makes it worthwhile in my opinion.

I really like this primer.  It does not dry out my lips and keeps my lipstick on until I drink or eat something.  Even then you can still see a trace of the lipstick color.  I will definitely purchase this again.

I love this stuff!  I use a stiffer brush to apply to the eye lid area.  It last all day!  Seriously, my eye makeup looks as good at 9:00 pm as it did at 7:00 am.  No creasing, color is good.  I use a powder eye shadow and it goes on smoother and very even when applied on top of this primer.  I did not find as good of results when used on lips. In fact, I noticed no difference with the length lipstick lasted when applying this primer first.  But for eyes - I will always use this product before applying eye makeup.

I don't usually buy brands that I'm not familiar with and do spend around $40 on a eye shadow primer. After reading So many good reviews and me having a busy schedule, I decited to give it a try. I have long nails and knew I wouldn't be able to use my fingers for the application, so I just used my concealer brush and I could not believe how amazing this little tub of goodness is. My eye shadow looked amazing and lasted all day ( 6am-9pm) , despite my oily skin. I will recommend this primer to all my friends, I just love it.

Consumer_Reviews.review_title: My eye makeup looks almost as good at the end of the day as it did ...
Consumer_Reviews.review_text: My eye makeup looks almost as good at the end of the day as it did when I put it on.  The only complaint is that it is hard to get out of the jar without getting it under my fingernails.  Am I applying it wrong, should I be using an applicator?  Other than that, the product is working great for me.
Perfect color for my skintone.... medium tan. I use this product on my lips and eyes as a primer. Would definitely recommend this.

Consumer_Reviews.review_title: Even makes eyeliner apply more easily, it's more smooth and controlled having the matte ...
Consumer_Reviews.review_text: makes a real difference with Eyeshadow and Eyeliner staying on and lasting the day!  Even makes eyeliner apply more easily, it's more smooth and controlled having the matte material to grab on to, I suppose.

Consumer_Reviews.review_title: My new essential in my makeup kit
Consumer_Reviews.review_text: I love this.  I have never used a primer, and OMG what a difference.  Color goes on smoother.  Stays all day.  Doesn't crease.  I am in my 40's and I have had trouble with crease marks due to my skin being looser and more wrinkly than it used to be.  This helps with those problems immensely.  I am hooked. Creates a nice light palette to start your eye shadows... Thanks!

Consumer_Reviews.review_title: Tiny jar goes a long way
Consumer_Reviews.review_text: When I received the SHANY Eye Primer I was surprised by how small the jar was.  However, a little goes a long way.  I just dab some on the pad of my finger and apply. It goes on smoothly and enhances eye shadow colors well.  My shadow stays on all day.  I haven't noticed any creasing. I only apply a thin layer and it works great!  I wonder if those who have experienced creasing are applying it more heavily than I do. Those who are not using a brush and have long nails may have a harder time getting the product on their finger pads.
A nice paraben free primer for eyes and lips. Works well.

AMAZING!! I can seriously leave on my lipcolor ALL DAY (we're talking 8 AM to 8 PM) with no smudging or bleeding. The lip color I put on top stays on and I don't need to reapply.PROS: You only need A LITTLE TINY BIT.CONS: The jar is shockingly small (I think I could put 7 on my palm), and it's drying if you don't put on vaseline or chapstick first. Also horrible looking if you don't exfoliate your lips first. It will accentuate every crack you have.
This container is so tiny. Don't expect to get much from it.

This is a wonderful base, but be prepared for the tiny size! That is the only reason I gave it 4 stars instead of 5. I use a wooden cuticle stick to scoop out a little, as it is easier and more sanitary than putting a pinky directly into the bottle. This base is a nice, light flesh color for the eyelids and can serve as a highlighter eyeshadow. It greatly increases the amount of time my eyeshadow lasts, and appears to smooth crepiness.

Consumer_Reviews.review_title: Better than my MAC paint pots
Consumer_Reviews.review_text: Better than my MAC paint pots.This product is amazing eyeshadows look great and never crease it's small but I would still buy again
Wife said this was the best she used. Did not burn her eyes like others.

The first time using this product, I had a burning sensation on my eyelids. I just applied with finger and then it started to burn and made my eyes water. I have to remove it immediately, as it was causing much irritation. Not fun! I see a lot of positive reviews.. So, I don't know what happened here..

I'm no expert on eye primer at all (this is my first one), but I bought this in the hope that it would help my eye make-up stay in place throughout my long work days, and it seems to do the trick. I've also noticed less eye irritation at the end of the day when I use it. Probably because it keeps my eyeshadow from melting into my eyes by the end of the day. I figure that's always a good thing.

I really like this product as a base under eye shadow.  It helps my oily lids hold the color without creasing.  The only problem I have is that I usually use a finger to apply such bases, and the container is so small, it is a challenge to fit my finger in.  I imagine I will have to dedicate a brush to applying the base, but other than that, it is light and dries quickly as an effective base.

Consumer_Reviews.review_title: I have had better but this will do
Consumer_Reviews.review_text: It was okay ...I have had better but this will do.  I use it mainly for my lips.  To see if my lipstick ..gloss etc won't bleed and last longer and it did not bleed.  So good and will use up.  But probably won't buy again as its just not exactly what I want.

Consumer_Reviews.review_title: Lipstick lasts 2-hours longer But Color Not As Dense
Consumer_Reviews.review_text: I wear makeup and lipstick on a five days a week basis as a business professional. Not a lot like the average YouTube beauty guru, but just enough to enhance my classic features and highlight my eyes and lips. I am currently using another brand as an eye primer so I purchased this specifically as a primer for my lipstick.After applying this primer for about a month now, I'd say its ok. Not exceptional performance, but not bad either. It comes in a round, one-inch high glass container that is about the circumference of an American quarter. The product is a light pinkish taupe shade, creamy in the container and on your fingertips but will quickly dry once applied on your lips into an almost white opaque shade - making you look like a corpse after it's applied on lips.The good thing about this primer is that it makes my lipstick's color brighter, but the downside also means the color is no longer as dense in hue as intended. By that I mean a super red lipstick will be brighter but no longer as red if it was applied without the primer. With this primer, red lipstick becomes pinkish, nude shades almost disappear and purple, brown and pink shade lipsticks all become lighter by two to three shades in color. In terms of the primer extending the Life of the lipstick on lips, it does. But not for hours on end. I've noticed it has added about two extra hours to my lipstick's wear. Unfortunately, as the lipstick color fades, It leaves a color ring around my lips, as if my lipstick was a thick lip liner, an effect that I hate because it looks unsightly and gauche.For spending only eight dollars on this product, I won't complain too hard, but still wished it added more wear to my lipstick. Not sure if I'll purchase again but I will definitely finish the container, which from as little as is needed to apply, will likely last for months to come. 3 stars out of 5.
I give it 3 stars because my eye shadow still creased.

Consumer_Reviews.review_title: it is working better than most products I've tried
Consumer_Reviews.review_text: Arrived on time without problems. The base is a bit challenging to get out of the container- fingertip will not work, q tip was OK- so far a small eyeliner brush is working for me. I purchased mainly as a lip base, it is working better than most products I've tried. I tried it as a shadow base and was very pleased with how it worked- all day stay power.  I would purchase again, my preference is to keep lip products separate from eye products. The price is very reasonable so it is not a problem.
Good buy, dried out fast but u just can add oil
I haven't used it as a lip primer, but I really like it as an eye primer. Tiny jar but a little goes a long way  - happy with my purchase.
My shadow stays on all day now!
Long wearing with no creasing

I don't know what I was doing before I started using this primer, but I can only imagine it was terrible. Even during the hottest days of summer, my eyeshadow has not budged or creased! And my skin is regularly an oil slick, so this is absolutely the highest of praise. Use quickly with either brush or fingertip, because it sets quickly. Watch your eyeshadow turn heads all day.

Consumer_Reviews.review_title: so I tried it and like I expected
Consumer_Reviews.review_text: Not returnable for some reason, so I tried it and like I expected, too light. Left my skin looking ashy around my lips...had to apply more foundation over it. I didn't like the look.
Small perfect for travel
I am giving the product 4 stars -1 star because it is so tiny it would have to be purchased often more  this is more like a tiny sample size you would get free from a manufacture.

At first, I was skeptical about the size of the product. This is definitely the tiniest thing I have in my makeup collection. However, I only need to just barely touch my finger to the product inside to get enough to cover my entire eyelid. This will definitely last a long time. Provides a great base and is full coverage.

Consumer_Reviews.review_title: This stuff is great, but ladies beware
Consumer_Reviews.review_text: This stuff is great , but ladies beware, it takes very little to get the job done! This little pot will last at least a year, if not longer. Also, it helps to use a small cosmetic (eye shadow) brush because it's kind of hard to get out with your fingertip, if you have any length to your nails it will get up under them.
Not as good as other brands.
Not the shade I thought but it works well for preventing running and smudging eyeliner for a busy hospital worker who sweats a bit.
Nice and creamy.  Goes on easily, but does not help eye shadow to last all day.
Works great
Yes this is great
It's nice but it's just too small

Great product! Is on my list of must haves for beauty products. Your lips are polished smooth when you use this product. Your lips are neutralized and your lipstick or gloss glides on and stays put. No feathering. It is on the small side but it only takes a small amount of product. I have not tried it for the eyes yet. This is my first review I have ever done on any product.
Love it
I love it

Consumer_Reviews.review_title: I love this product - I'm not much of a make-up ...
Consumer_Reviews.review_text: I love this product - I'm not much of a make-up person though.  The only reason it didn't get 5 stars is because it's so tiny that only your finger-tip fits in so if you have a nail (even a slight nail), it's hard to get it onto your fingertip.  I guess you could scrape it onto the back of your nail and put it on a fingertip of the other hand.  I the color of this primer and it lasts all day.

I used to buy Ultima 2 base at $30 till I read the review of this product and now I am sold.  Thanks for printing reviews so we can judge for ourselves  .After I sent for one to try, I reordered two more!  I find that I can also use it on dark spots pigmentation on the face and blemishes to camafloge them.  GREAT PRODUCT  and very economical!
Nice product but too pricy for the quantity

Consumer_Reviews.review_title: Nice Product But Size is TINY, TINY, TINY.
Consumer_Reviews.review_text: Could not give it five stars because the size is considerably smaller than expected.  Good coverage for my tan complexion and goes on silky smooth.  Depending on how long this tiny, tiny, tiny size lasts I may purchase again, but we will see.

Consumer_Reviews.review_title: my eyes are very sensitive and this doesnt irritate them ...
Consumer_Reviews.review_text: my eyes are very sensitive and this doesnt irritate them at all but holds my eyeshadow all day (which otherwise slides off after a few hours).

This primer goes on nice and smooth and a little goes a lot way. It makes a nice base for the more vibrant colored lipsticks and they show up more true than just putting it on over your lips. I wish it lasted a little longer but it still helped my lipstick last much longer than usual
Eye shadow doesn't crease or fade during the day.  Works well isn't heavy at all.

Not sure what I expected from this product but not too impressed with it. Although the color is good and it goes on nicely, I don't find that it extends the wear of my eyeshadow or eyeliner at all. Still looking for a good primer that helps my make up stay on all day.

this primer is very nice, not shiny and dries quickly. Keeps my lipstick on longer without any touchups.  Doesn't change the color of my lipstick or lip gloss either. I ranked this just a little lower than five stars, as the pot is small and harder to get the product out efficiently without waste.  Would be better if this product came in at tube.  Keeps my lipstick from bleeding, which was very important to me!

This is a great primer, at a great price! I use it beneath all of my shadows, especially when I have a long day ahead. It didn't work well with Shany brand eyeshadows, but they don't have very good pigmentation to begin with. With my other shadows though, it helps the shadow last all day without creasing and pumps up the real color and helps the shadow stick better.
This eyeshadow base is as good as more expensive ones I've tried, but at a great price.

Consumer_Reviews.review_title: This is a great product for the price
Consumer_Reviews.review_text: This is a great product for the price. I was using an eye shadow primer by Senna before which was at least double and they are fairly comparable. The only issue I have had is that I feel like this primer is a bit on the dark side and I have tan/honey colored skin so I would imagine it's even darker on fair skin. Other than that, once the shadow goes on it lasts all day.

I bought this product to help conceal some dark pink skin on my eyelids. Isn't heavy enough to keep the discoloration covered, and my skin swelled a little bit while wearing it. Given, the skin is irritated to begin with. Am switching to a stick concealer, plus a nude matte eyeshadow. Will keep to conceal skin discolorations on other parts of the face.

Consumer_Reviews.review_title: if not the best eye primers I've ever used
Consumer_Reviews.review_text: One of, if not the best eye primers I've ever used. I've used Mac, Burburry, too-faced, Urban, as well as drug store brands etc. I LIKE some of them and a couple tend to dry out after only a short time. I LOVE this one! I've had it for a few months and it remains creamy! Try it! I bet you will love it too-and the price is great!
I LOVE this primer!!  It is tinted, so evens out the darker tone of my eyelids and makes my eyeshadow look great.  It lasts for as long as my makeup is on.  Awesome product.

Consumer_Reviews.review_title: I like this eye primer a lot however
Consumer_Reviews.review_text: I like this eye primer a lot however, wish it would have come with an applicator of some sort.  I don't like sticking my fingers in to the pod and have used many q-tips getting the product out.I think that it is a great shade and lightens my eye lids just a bit to make my eye make-up pop.  Will order again.

I like how it softens my lips and fills the cracks. Makes the lipsticks look great! Bad things are you must let it dry on ur lips before adding lipstick or else it mixes with the lipstick and makes an odd color. Also the container is very small and u have to use a brush but you have to wash it right away or else the primer hardens onto the brush.

I don't know, I'm not make up savvy), but I have to make sure my nails are cut super short (which I usually do on my left hand anyways) so that I don't get the primer under my nail. I love the product itself though! I've tried other primers and I've always had that stupid make up crease by the end of the day, but I've not had that problem at all since this!

My eyelids are hooded so when I applied eyeliner, it would look fine for a little while, then smudge terribly onto the crease of my lid. I tried numerous products with no success - just a big greasy smear after a couple of hours. I went to several make up specialist stores that told me I might as well give up trying to use liner altogether.  After trying so many products that failed to work, I was very skeptical when I ordered Shany eye and lip primer/base.  It works beautifully. I use it one time a day on clean, makeup free eyelids, apply a good quality eyeliner and it stays put until I remove it at bedtime.  I can wear eyeliner now and am very happy with the product.

Consumer_Reviews.review_title: My skin had a bad reaction to it...
Consumer_Reviews.review_text: I wanted to like it, but I couldn't. It wasn't creamy at all. It was a dry powder when I received it and opened it. It did not go on smooth, it left wrinkles in my eyelids. After I applied it and applied eye shadow, I removed it. Ibgave it a second chance the next day, same issue, so I removed it. Later in the day my eyelids felt extremely dry.. By the end of the next day they were peeling excessively. Now, today, my eyelids are extremely dry and feel paper thin, they look like all the blood vessels in my eyelids have burst. I already have sensitive skin, this is terrible.It may work for you if you don't have sensitive skin and they send you non dried product. If you have sensitive skin, don't use it.Added pictures of my now damaged eyelids.I want to return it, but shipping charges probably don't make it worth it. I wish I could get all of my money back.

Consumer_Reviews.review_title: Good Things Come In Small Packages!
Consumer_Reviews.review_text: I've been wearing makeup for many years and always had fallout so by the end of the day, my makeup never looked as good as it did in the morning. I figured this was just normal until I discovered eyelid primer and decided I should at least try some to see how it works. Based on my searches, there are a lot of makeup primers on the market and I really didn't know which kind would work best for me but I came upon this Shany eye and lip primer and decided to order it because it looked like a good option to try.When it first arrived, I was surprised at how small the jar is. It was loose in the Amazon box with other purchases and could be easily lost so make sure you check the box carefully if you decide to purchase this product. I've included a picture of the jar compared to a quarter. I initially was annoyed that I had paid the money I did for such a small jar of primer but I've been using this for about four months and have barely made a dent in the jar so that makes me happier since it is lasting me a long time already. The primer has little to no scent and is very easy to apply. I just use my pointer finger to dip it in the jar and usually two applications per eye is enough for me. This primer is a lightly-colored, creamy powder and in the four months I've been using it, my makeup has stayed on all day with very little fallout. My makeup is even bolder too so it makes my eyes stand out! I don't have oily eyelids so I can't say how this product works with them but I've used it in the heat and humidity with good success in keeping my makeup flawless all day.Overall, I'm very happy with this product and I will buy it again when the time comes to buy more. At first, I didn't think it was worth the money considering the small size but it is lasting me a really long time already so I feel this product is worth the money. If you decide to purchase this, make sure you check your box carefully so it doesn't get thrown out with the packaging since it's a very small jar. I recommend this product and love how my makeup looks because of it!

This product is very drying to the eyelids & makes the eye make-up look dry.  I have aging skin and do not want my skin to look dry.  I use it on my lips, but I don't see the benefit--the lipstick or lip gloss still comes off easily.  I don't recommend unless one has extremely oily skin.

It works!  I have seasonal allergies that cause my eyes to tear. I've never had a primer/base that survives until Shany.  I L O V E this product.  I have the lip and eye pencil collection as well and they too, survive my allergies.  If you get their eye pencils, get the primer, too because the eye shadow pencils will not last through allergies and or time.  I have lots of allergies to cosmetics and this ia now the only product line I will use.  NO TALC!!!

Consumer_Reviews.review_title: This comes in a very tiny jar, but very ...

I only have to apply it once a day. I apply it in the morning around 7am and when I get home from work around 6:30pm my eyeshadow still look fresh. I apply a very thin layer and it lasts all day. It is definitely worth the money. I don't know how well it works as a lip primer, I haven't used it for that and I won't.
